home.title: Welcome to BTMR
home.subtitle: Beautiful Text Mining Reader - Extract and summarize academic papers with AI

processPapers.title: Process Papers
processPapers.description: Upload or provide URLs to academic papers for AI-powered extraction and summarization.

viewPapers.title: View Papers
viewPapers.description: Browse and manage your processed papers with search and filtering capabilities.

processPaper.title: Process New Paper
processPaper.subtitle: Upload a PDF file or provide a URL to an academic paper for AI-powered extraction and summarization.

inputSection.title: Paper Input
inputSection.description: Choose how you want to provide the paper for processing

urlInput.label: Paper URL (ArXiv, DOI, or direct link)

fileInput.label: Upload PDF File
fileInput.placeholder: Click to upload or drag and drop your PDF file here

languageSection.title: Output Language
languageSection.description: Choose the language for the generated report

processPaper.processingCompleted: Processing completed! Redirecting to papers page...

errors.invalidUrl: Invalid URL format. Please provide a valid ArXiv URL or direct paper URL.

openaiApiKey.label: OpenAI API Key
openaiApiKey.description: Your OpenAI API key for accessing GPT models

apiBaseUrl.label: API Base URL
apiBaseUrl.description: Custom API endpoint (leave default for OpenAI)

defaultModel.label: Default Model
defaultModel.customDescription: Enter a custom model ID that your API provider supports
defaultModel.placeholder: Enter custom model ID (e.g., gpt-4, claude-3-sonnet, etc.)

translateModel.label: Translation Model
translateModel.customDescription: Enter a custom model ID that your API provider supports

maxPaperLength.label: Max Paper Length (characters)
maxPaperLength.description: Maximum characters to send to LLM (1,000 - 200,000)

imageQuality.label: Image Quality (1-100)
imageQuality.description: JPEG compression quality (higher = better quality, larger files)

messages.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to defaults? This action cannot be undone.
messages.testModelTooltip: Test if current model is available and show capabilities
messages.pleaseSelectModel: Please select a model to test
messages.failedToLoadModelsNote: Failed to load models. Please check your API configuration.

empty.title: Your processed papers will appear here. Start by processing your first paper!

confirmDelete.title: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"?
items: • The paper record from the database

notifications.submitted: Paper submitted successfully! Processing has started.
notifications.failed: Paper processing failed. Please check the error details.

metadata.retryInfo: This paper has been retried {{count}} time{{plural}}.

descriptions.completed: Your paper has been successfully processed and is ready for viewing.
descriptions.failed: An error occurred during processing. Please check the error details below.
descriptions.pending: Your paper is in the processing queue and will begin shortly.
descriptions.fetching: Downloading and preparing the paper content for processing.
descriptions.fetching_arxiv: Downloading the paper from ArXiv servers.
descriptions.fetching_content: Processing and parsing the paper content.
descriptions.processing_images: Downloading and processing embedded images and figures.
descriptions.extracting: Using AI to extract and structure information from the paper.
descriptions.extracting_structure: Analyzing the paper structure and identifying key sections.
descriptions.extracting_content: Extracting detailed content using advanced AI models.
descriptions.generating: Creating the final formatted output files.
descriptions.generating_html: Generating the HTML summary with formatted content.
descriptions.generating_pdf: Creating the PDF version of the summary.
descriptions.finalizing: Saving metadata and finalizing the processing pipeline.
